price: 49. O tie Ugnyje sakys Pragaro saugotojams (angelams): „Prašykite savo Viešpaties palengvinti mums kančią dienai.“
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ فِي ٱلنَّارِ لِخَزَنَةِ جَهَنَّمَ ٱدۡعُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ يُخَفِّفۡ عَنَّا يَوۡمٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waqāla alladhīna fī al-nāri likhazanati jahannama id'ʿū rabbakum yukhaffif ʿannā yawman mina al-ʿadhābi
